import React from 'react' import { MongoClient } from 'mongodb'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; const Signup = () => { const uri = 'mongodb+srv://:@/'; const client = new MongoClient(uri); const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const email = event.target.elements.email.value; const name = event.target.elements.name.value; const password = event.target.elements.password.value; try { await client.connect(); const collection = client.db('').collection('users'); await collection.insertOne({ email, name, password }); console.log('Registration successful!'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error during registration:', error); } finally { await client.close(); } }; {/* Login and registration starts */} {/* Login and registration ends*/} return (
